trends: There has been one other sighting in Newcastle
There were no other sightings in Newcastle on or around June 30th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were doing fireworks. While looking in the sky, we saw a glowing orb going across the sky. 2 mins passed and another went by. About 4-5 went by in the course of 10 mins. I was a little shocked. I always thought there was no such thing as aliens.
Summary: Glowing orb. Unlike any aircraft i've ever seen.
